    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Expansion of solids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion der Körper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expansion des solides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expansão dos sólidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espansione dei solidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επέκταση των στερεών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extensión de sólidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a solid holder and iron bar. When the solid bar is heated it expands and no longer fits the holder.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron bar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particle model</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen festen Halter- und 
Eisenstab. Wenn der feste Stab erhitzt wird, erweitert er und 
paßt nicht mehr den Halter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une barre pleine de 
support et de fer. Quand la barre pleine est chauffée elle 
augmente et n'adapte plus le support.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma barra contínua do 
suporte e do ferro. Quando a barra contínua é aquecida expande
e nenhuns ajustes mais longos o suporte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una barra solida del 
ferro e del supporto. Quando la barra solida è riscaldata 
espande e più non misura il supporto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει στερεά ράβδο κατόχων και
σιδήρου. Όταν η στερεά ράβδος θερμαίνεται επεκτείνει και 
δεν εγκαθιστά πλέον τον κάτοχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una barra sólida del 
sostenedor y del hierro. Cuando se calienta la barra sólida se 
amplía y ningunos ajustes más largos el sostenedor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion</string>
          </keyword>
